p.span: This pane displays information about the selected object, if no object is selected, the other fields are empty and inactive.

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

p.span: The values of mass and charge have a standard form.
The drop-down list on the right is the power of ten.
You can enter a number in a non-standard form, however, the next time you select this object, the program will translate it into a standard form.
It is very important to pay attention to this in subsequent changes.

p.span: During the simulation, it is impossible to change parameters such as speed and coordinates, as they are updated every time (even if the values do not change), to change you need to set a pause.
